code: import React from"react";import{CardContainer,DeleteButton}from'./styled';import{useHistory}from'react-router-dom';import{goToTripDetailsPage}from'../../routes/coordinator';import{deleteTrip}from'../../services/requests';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var AdminTripCard=function AdminTripCard(props){var id=props.id,name=props.name,getTrips=props.getTrips;var history=useHistory();var onClickDelete=function onClickDelete(e){e.stopPropagation();if(window.confirm("Tem certeza que deseja deletar a viagem ".concat(name,"?"))){deleteTrip(id,getTrips);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(CardContainer,{onClick:function onClick(){return goToTripDetailsPage(history,id);},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DeleteButton,{onClick:onClickDelete})]});};export default AdminTripCard;
